mapper.select:
select as dateValue,avg(t.RENTAL) as zj,count(t.id) ts from house_rental t where t.rentdate is not null
group by

select sr.name as regionName,nvl(avg(t.RENTAL),0) as zj,count(t.id) ts from house_rental t left join sys_region sr on t.regioncode = sr.code where sr.name is not null
group by sr.name

select t.yf dateValue,count(t.houseid)ts from (select hnt.houseid, to_char(hnt.basj,'mm')yf from house_new_trade hnt where hnt.currentstatus = 5 and hnt.houseid is not null and to_char(hnt.basj, 'yyyy') = #{year} union all select hst.houseid, to_char(hst.basj,'mm') yf from house_stock_trade hst where hst.currentstatus = 5 and hst.houseid is not null and to_char(hst.basj, 'yyyy') = #{year}) t group by t.yf order by to_number(t.yf)

select count(1)ts,sum(h.SCJZMJ)mj,sum(t.zj)zj from ( select hnt.houseid, hnt.zj from house_new_trade hnt where hnt.currentstatus = 5 and hnt.houseid is not null
union all select hst.houseid, hst.zj from house_stock_trade hst where hst.currentstatus = 5 and hst.houseid is not null )t left join h on h.id = t.houseid

select nvl(d.name,'未知')name ,count(1)ts,sum(h.SCJZMJ)mj from (
select hnt.houseid, hnt.zj,hnt.dj from house_new_trade hnt where hnt.currentstatus = 5 and hnt.houseid is not null
union all
select hst.houseid, hst.zj,hst.dj from house_stock_trade hst where hst.currentstatus = 5 and hst.houseid is not null
)t left join h on h.id = t.houseid left join dictionary d on d.code = h.FWYT1 and d.type='fwyt' group by d.name order by ts desc

select nvl(sum(case when t.currentstatus = 5 then 1 else 0 end),0) as AlreadySoldCount, nvl(sum(case when t.currentstatus != 5 then 1 else 0 end),0) as UnsoldCount, nvl(sum(case when t.currentstatus = 5 then h.SCJZMJ else 0 end),0) as AlreadySoldArea, nvl(sum(case when t.currentstatus != 5 then h.SCJZMJ else 0 end),0) as UnsoldCountArea from (
select hnt.houseid,hnt.currentstatus from house_new_trade hnt where hnt.houseid is not null
union all
select hst.houseid,hst.currentstatus from house_stock_trade hst where hst.houseid is not null
)t left join h on h.id = t.houseid
